insight: Paper 1.21.10+ uses plugin class remapping (io.papermc.reflectionrewriter.runtime.AbstractDefaultRulesReflectionProxy) that intercepts Class.forName() calls. When checking for classes from other plugins, you must pass the target plugin's classloader: Class.forName("pkg.Class", true, Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("PluginName").getClass().getClassLoader()). Without this, ClassNotFoundException occurs due to classloader isolation.
